means: 为本党利益改划选举区分，不公正操纵，欺骗

list.exp: 党派性的截利蝾螈行为
list.abs: ...操纵的性质来看,最常见的有两种截利蝾螈行为,一种是党派性的截利蝾螈行为( partisan gerrymandering) , 这体现了截利蝾螈的原始.
11、杰利蝾螈（gerrymandering），乃指选区划分方式，是专为某方选举利益而设计的，通常是指被政治操作而导致选区划分不公。 …
不公的选区划分（gerrymandering）情况，一直是大马选委会为人诟病的种种舞弊情况之一。2011年底，有马国公民根据2008年的选 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from the name of Governor Elbridge Gerry of Massachusetts + salamander, from the supposed similarity between a salamander and the shape of a new voting district on a map drawn when he was in office (1812), the creation of which was felt to favour his party; the map (with claws, wings, and fangs added)，was published in the Boston Weekly Messenger, with the title The Gerry-Mander

means.word_mean: 1. an act of gerrymandering (dividing a voting area so as to give your own party an unfair advantage)
1. divide unfairly and to one's advantage; of voting districts
